ygData.subject: Re: update on MM faction
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Congrats!  That sounds like fun, and you can really mess with the other players as well. Which princess do you kill?  The upstairs or downstairs one (Lenia
ygData.messageBody:
Grant Vanderhule wrote:
>
> From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>
>
> it worked like a charm :) i am now indifferent to the inhabitants of
> mistmoore castle (warmly if affected by wolf form.. yay!) and can freely
> explore the place :) that said, does anybody know where the maid and butler
> can be found inside? not that i will kill them personally.. i'll just know
> where to lead my friends to so they can camp the teeth for me ;) hehe...
>
> sadly xicotl or lord mistmoore didnt pop up while i was there, but if i
> happen to get screenshots at a later date i'll be sure to let you folks know.
>
> Beld Demonblade
> Fennin Ro
>


Congrats! That sounds like fun, and you can really mess with the
other players as well.

Which princess do you kill? The upstairs or downstairs one (Lenia
or Lenya)? One is a DE right? What level is she?

How many times did you kill her?

Xilith
